name: WordHack
description:
Welcome to Word Hack!

Can you solve the word?

Use your word puzzle skills to figure out the secret word and defeat the evil wordmaker.  Save us, Mr. Hacker!

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Word Hack is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the game Wordle.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
